entry.title: Tuesday: Partly cloudy. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then light snow and blowing snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
